Recent downtime

Hi folks,

Apologies for the recent downtime. It seems that our primary website host is having difficulties accessing our database server (they’re on different servers), so until that gets resolved I’ve put the site on this secondary server. Everything from the primary website is being redirected to the secondary server until it’s fixed.
